metadata.title: Serial Oceanographic Data

creators.name: Development Institute (NFRDI), Korea Oceanographic Data Centre (KODC)

metadata.description: The serial oceanographic observations were carried out bimonthly on 175 fixed stations from 22 lines (East Sea; 8, South Sea : 7, West Sea ; 6 lines, Korea-Japan line ; 1) in Korean waters, since 1961, in February, April, June, August, October, and December. The water temperature, salinity, dissolved oxygen and meteorogical factors were recorded as well as nutrients data in some years and months.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To archive serial oceanographic observations.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Daily

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: Contact Source.
